else if (NPCID == 400) { //Radimus erkle skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if (IsItemInBag(5009)) { sendFrame126("Radimus Erkle", 4902); sendFrame126("Thank you so very much! Please, take this scroll,", 4903); sendFrame126("read it to gain access to the hidden guild, where you can hang", 4904); sendFrame126("out, buy many things you can't find anywhere else, and", 4905); sendFrame126("kill unknown species of monsters! Thank you!!!!!!!!", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; deleteItem(5009, getItemSlot(5009), 1); addItem(6798, 1); } else { legendsInfo(); addItem(730, 1); addItem(7677, 1); } }
